description: AbstractThematicSurface is the abstract superclass for all types of thematic surfaces.

properties.name: area
properties.description: Specifies qualified areas related to the thematic surface.

properties.name: lod0MultiCurve
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiCurve geometry that represents the thematic surface in Level of Detail 0.

properties.name: lod1MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the thematic surface in Level of Detail 1.

properties.name: lod2MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the thematic surface in Level of Detail 2.

properties.name: lod3MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the thematic surface in Level of Detail 3.

properties.name: pointCloud
properties.description: Relates to a 3D PointCloud that represents the thematic surface.

properties.name: lod4MultiSurface
properties.description: Relates to a 3D MultiSurface geometry that represents the thematic surface in Level of Detail 4. Deprecated since CityGML 3.0.
